    GewtMaterialTable

    public static class GewtMaterialTable.GewtMaterialInfiniteDataTable<T>
extends gwt.material.design.client.ui.table.MaterialDataTable<T>
implements gwt.material.design.client.data.infinite.HasLoader
    A data table that supports infinite data scrolling.
